job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: DESCRIPTION:             <br>•	These contingent workers will work closely with full-time research scientists and software engineers who are leading<br>•	computer vision research projects to ensure that the process runs smoothly, and that data annotation quality remains high to<br>•	train state-of-the-art machine learning models. Duties include:<br>•	Data wrangling: writing data pipelines to upload annotations automatically; running existing ML models on large volumes of<br>•	data; ad-hoc data analysis / visualization<br><br>Annotation task and vendor management: <br>•	creating data annotation guidelines; curating ideal “gold standard” examples for annotators.<br>•	managing back-and-forth communications with annotators; reviewing annotation quality to identify themes and<br>•	relaying appropriate feedback to annotation vendors.<br><br>Skills required:<br>•	SQL, Python, Linux command line (Bash)<br>•	Very high attention to detail for managing large, complex annotation efforts<br>•	Good written communication skills to coordinate with annotators and team members<br>•	2+ years’ work experience, including experience working with customer teams<br><br>Top must-have HARD skills:<br>•	SQL and Python is a need<br>•	Linux command line<br><br>Top 3 good-to-have skills:<br>•	Great communication<br>•	Understanding of AI models would be great<br><br>Interview Loop/Process<br>•	2 coding interviews and 1 general interview<br>•	PDF homework-offline analysis, will submit the answers along with their resume<br>
